title: Vera Bradley Teddy Fleece Sherpa Small Backpack
features: TEDDY BEAR FLEECE -- stay on trend this season with this super soft sherpa mini back pack, featuring cozy, high pile teddy fleece that is sure to turn heads
CHIC & SECURE -- keep your essentials at your fingertips & look good on-the-go with a zip pocket with two pen pockets
ENDLESS ORGANIZATION -- The two slips on the side & the slip on the back wall keep your essential supplies organized & quick to access
STYLISH, LIGHTWEIGHT & SIZED RIGHT -- the Small backpack measures 12 inches high, 9 inches Wide, & 5 inches deep with a 3 inch Top handle drop & 33 inch adjustable straps
description: Soft boucle sherpa fleece. Exterior features a front zip pocket (with one slip & two pen pockets) & three slip pockets. Interior features one zip & two slip pockets. Zip closures. Spot clean with gentle detergent. Rinse thoroughly, lay flat to dry. Carry On Complaint. Vera Bradley is your back to school destination! Our back packs are perfect for back to school, work, & travel, including backpacks for men, backpacks for women, backpacks for girls, & backpacks for boys. Our bookbags have plenty of organization, whether you are shopping for a large backpack or a mini backpack.
